solution_line_template: She has {points_from_red_buckets} points from red buckets because {red_buckets_played} x {points_per_red_bucket} = <<{red_buckets_played}*{points_per_red_bucket}={points_from_red_buckets}>>{points_from_red_buckets}

She has {points_from_green_buckets} points from green buckets because {green_buckets_played} x {points_per_green_bucket} = <<{green_buckets_played}*{points_per_green_bucket}={points_from_green_buckets}>>{points_from_green_buckets}
She has spent ${money_spent} on games because {games_played} x {cost_per_play} = <<{games_played}*{cost_per_play}={money_spent}>>{money_spent}
She has ${money_left} left to spend because {initial_money} - {money_spent} = <<{initial_money}-{money_spent}={money_left}>>{money_left}
She can play {additional_games_possible} more game because {money_left} / {cost_per_play} = <<{money_left}/{cost_per_play}={additional_games_possible}>>{additional_games_possible}

The most she can earn in the final game is {max_points_final_game} because {rings_per_play} x {points_per_green_bucket} = <<{rings_per_play}*{points_per_green_bucket}={max_points_final_game}>>{max_points_final_game}

The most she can score overall is {total_max_points} because {points_from_red_buckets} + {points_from_green_buckets} + {max_points_final_game} = <<{points_from_red_buckets}+{points_from_green_buckets}+{max_points_final_game}={total_max_points}>>{total_max_points}
